INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the effect of the vitamin K antagonist and of the risk of hemorrhage
INTERACTION.COMMENT: More frequent testing of the INR. Possible adjustment of the dosage of the vitamin K antagonist during the treatment with the tetracycline antibiotic and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the digestive absorption of the tetracycline antibiotics
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the calcium salts at a different time from the tetracycline antibiotic (more than two hours apart, if possible).

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: With the tetracycline antibiotics administered by oral route: decrease of the digestive absorption of the tetracycline antibiotics (formation of complexes)
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the iron salts at a different time from the tetracycline antibiotics (more than 2 hours apart, if possible).

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the digestive absorption of the strontium
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the strontium at a different time from the tetracycline antibiotics (more than two hours apart, if possible).
